ygData.subject: Re: Don't laugh at this question
ygData.msgSnippet: Exp depends _alot_ on the levels of the other people in the group.  I have been in Bouncer groups for over 10 levels now.  At 35 with 45 s and 49.999 s, yes it
ygData.messageBody:
Exp depends _alot_ on the levels of the other people in the group. I have
been in Bouncer groups for over 10 levels now. At 35 with 45's and
49.999's, yes it sucks. But when you are 45 or 49.9999 and there is no
where else to go.... Well, some exp is better than none at all.

Sylly.

p.s. Ak'Anon is a dungeon right? (Although I tried killing the gnome guards
but had to quit. They are just too cute to kill <sigh>) Brownies on the
other hand... And Freeport is a city dungeon now. The PoF Spectre cave was
empty - of spectres that is - at midnight Sunday night because there were 3
campers there. Sad thing - I was one of them.


----- Original Message -----
From: Blitz Krieg <blitz_krieg@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, February 27, 2000 3:30 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Don't laugh at this question


> From: "Blitz Krieg" <blitz_krieg@...>
>
> > Would it just
> > be better to join a group in one of the dungeons or kill ogre bouncers?
> >
> > Galtin of E'ci
>
> Ogre bouncers, imo, have not been good experience.
>
> Darkfox Reven'tsol
> Xegony
